channel.title: Home
channel.description: Astro Nano is a minimal and lightweight blog and portfolio.

item.title: GRASP
item.description: Led the development of embedded software for a robotic prosthetic arm featured at the 2024 Cybathlon

item.title: Khichdi
item.description: Implementing a programming language in Racket

item.title: Raytracing In One Weekend-ish
item.description: Rust implementation of the ray tracer described in Peter Shirley's book "Raytracing in One Weekend"

item.title: BurbotOS
item.description: Built a microkernel based operating system as part of CPSC 436A: OS Design and Implementation

item.title: Raycast
item.description: Use mirrors, portals, black holes and more to bring light to plants in this relaxing physics puzzler

item.title: Implementing Proper Tail Calls in C
item.description: This article explains trampolining - a technique that is used to implement tail calls in languages that does not support them

item.title: Eigencircles
item.description: Eigencircles are visualization of 2x2 matrices that provide a fascinating geometric understanding of matrix properties
